name: R-subcon
tagline: R package for subspace search based outier detection
body:
### Subspace Search for Outlier Detection ###

This project is created to make subspace search based outlier detection easily accessible as an R package. 

So far the repository contains some of the latest subspace search approaches such as GMD, CDSS and HiCS and a fast implementation of the well known LOF algorithm for the evaluation of subspace search results. Also functionality around score combination, scaling and redundancy evaluation is implemented.

The package can be directly installed from github via the devtools package. For an overview see https://github.com/holtri/R-subcon.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
